column1: EA1160 BETHNAL GREEN EAST JUNCTION TO BISHOP’S STORTFORD

column5: Length extends to 92 SLUs for DownPassenger Loop plus Broxbourne Platform 4

If reached from Platforms 1 or 2, or accessto Carriage Sidings requiredLength extends to 81 SLUs / 523m forUp Passenger Loop plus Bishop’sStortford Platform 3, will preventaccess/egress to/from Carriage SidingsAdditionally if accessed via Platform 3length is 47 SLUs / 303m clear ofplatform, but will prevent access/egressto/from Carriage Sidings

column1: EA1161 BISHOP’S STORTFORD TO ELY NORTH JUNCTION
